# vercel_network (Resource)

Provides a Network resource.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cidr` (String) The CIDR range of the Network.
- `name` (String) The name of the network.
- `region` (String) The Vercel region in which the Network exists.

### Optional

- `aws_availability_zone_ids` (List of String) The IDs of the AWS Availability Zones in which the network exists, if specified during creation.
- `team_id` (String) The unique identifier of the Team that owns the Network. Required when configuring a team resource if a default team has not been set in the provider.
- `timeouts` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `aws_account_id` (String) The ID of the AWS Account in which the network exists.
- `aws_region` (String) The AWS Region in which the network exists.
- `egress_ip_addresses` (List of String) The egress IP addresses of the Network.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the Network.
- `status` (String) The status of the Network.
- `vpc_id` (String) The ID of the AWS VPC which hosts the network.

<a id="nestedatt--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String) A string that can be [parsed as a duration](https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration) consisting of numbers and unit suffixes, such as "30s" or "2h45m". Valid time units are "s" (seconds), "m" (minutes), "h" (hours).
